data.message:
I'm on today because I need help I don't really know how to sum it up I mean I do but eminem my heart is broke it has been for years now an 
I just start it from the beginning I was born with a illness called jajerniaatresha it's a  intestinal block ag I had 9 feet of my intestines removed
(Mom)
What's up baby Why you crying come here tell me why you crying such little tears 
(Me) well these kids at school bulled me an punched me in the stomach pulled up my shirt an stared laughing a girl told me I was a freak because of the scar that God gave me 
(Mom) Sit down take a set let me tell you everything 
This one's my favorite ( baby pitchers)
What I remembered was laying in the room it was 833 the doctors rushed in they couldn't believe they weren't prepared u up by my sleeve an you were cut right there in ( stomach) front of me everyone in the room was scared I couldn't believe that God wanted to take you.  you were just here the purseser took place  (mom crying tears)  8 months later you were starting to feel better soon we came home an the doctor said he wasn't going to live so we dressed u up in that tucks Eto here let me go get it 
I was 3 when my dad left my sister was my only friend then a couple years latter my uncle died he died  from a coffee cup full of coke in his system shot him self right in frount of my aint an uncle lertallly a day befor my  5th birthday  ( I didn't have a party sence )(every year I ask for candles )a few months passed an cancer to place my grandmother died on his birthday (documentation) an soon did 5 others I was never the cool kid in school every girl I was with pushed me around they were just like me an you had hopes wishes an scars from there past i brought them up at the same time they made me week now the girl I loved is married an having a baby on the way 
I'm now 19 an living with my dad it's been 14 years sence iv seen him he tells me WHT his life has been then tells  me to get away from rap even tho he listened to it i wright songs trying to put the pain in the pages I just throw them away an they been deleted it's just not worth it because it's hard when you write a love songs to a person that isn't going to listen 
You have been my best friend sence I was little an I was born in Las Vegas Nevada myself I ain't experienced an I just have so much pain inside an my dad tells me to stop rapping I'm 19 almost 20 an I have tunes of anger in me 

My dad said he knew you from school and i don't know if he lied or not but I really love an I don't want to give it up 
I'm actually down the street I live close enuf my dream was to live where my favorite rapper lived an now I'm here 
I just wanted to share my story with you an it's all true you can even ask my mom
